text: The Treaty of Shimonoseki (, ) was signed between the Qing Dynasty and the Empire of Japan at Shimonoseki in 1895. It ended the First Sino-Japanese War (1894 - 1895). == Main terms of the treaty == * Korea was not a vassal-state under China. Korea would became an independent nation. * China had to give Japan 200 million taels (a tael had usually a little more silver than a (Spanish dollar). * Formosa, the Pescadores and the Liaotung peninsula ceded to Japan. * Chungking, Soochow, Hangchow and Shashih had to be opened for Japanese trading. * Japanese people were allowed to build industries and sell their products in China. == Other websites == * the Treaty of Shimonoseki (Chinese Version) * the Treaty of Shimonoseki (Japanese Version) Category:19th century in Japan Shimonoseki Category:19th-century treaties Category:1895 Category:19th century in China
